name: FNAF Locked Down DEMO
description: After the success of the Pizzaplex, Fazbear Entertainment set out to recreate all the previous restaurants. However shortly after the Pizzaplex burnt down due to unknown reasons funding for it was cancelled. After salvaging a few of the animatronics from the fire they were put in the first Freddy Fazbear's Pizzeria to store them. You are filling in for your friend as the night guard for a week as he is on holiday. Be careful all is not as it seems here!
